## Artwork Submission

**Title:**  
**Author/Nickname:**  

### Files included (required)
- [ ] PNG + SGX (same base filename)  
  OR  
- [ ] JPEG + SGX (same base filename)

List the filenames you added in `/art/`:
- `_____ .png/.jpg/.jpeg`
- `_____ .sgx`

### Confirmations
- [ ] I confirm I am the author or have permission to submit this artwork.
- [ ] I confirm the SGX matches the image (same base filename).
- [ ] I confirm these files belong in `/art/` only.
